item.title: R Basics 1
item.description: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome Welcome to to the course! This is the first of 2 sets of exercises introducing you to the R programming language1 that we will use throughout the workshop. ğŸ“ Lesson Preview Set up R and RStudio The R console Install packages Objects and assignment Types (character, numeric, vector, data frame, list) Component selection Workspace and history ğŸ Getting Started with R and RStudio To complete the exercises in this workshop, you will need to access RStudio.
